message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,300,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product.  While it sounds great, I'm not quite ready to commit to $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000.  This reflects the value I see in the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,250,000. I think this price reflects the value you see in the product, and it's a fair compromise between our initial offers.
